TopicTitle: I can't access my original forum account/avatar!

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, i'm Planetfall but the forums don't think so.

I don't know if it was do to the new forum overhaul (looks great by the way) but when I went to sign in it kept saying my password was incorrect. So then I did the "I forgot my password" thing with sending an email to yourself to prove your you but the forums said  there's no user with my address. I looked myself up and didn't find anything suspicious on my account. I'm just so annoyed. I suppose i could start over on this new account i made, but I'd really not like having to do everything over again. Has anyone else had this problem? I'd really appreciate any feedback.

Sincerely Planetfall (maybe I should start writing 2).

P.S. I'm lucky to experience First World Problems.
Great Thanks! What do I need to do?
Hopefully nothing, as now when you log in you should have all the PlanetFall stuff on the PlanetFall #2 account, let me know when you're online and I can change the name as well.
